title: Sports/Banner Font(s)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725063257im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1111_Halifax_Mooseheads_Retired_Jerseys_3556.jpg)

Hi there,

Wondering if anyone is able to identify the fonts used in these banners (the name and number). Appreciate any help, been trying to match all day.

Thanks
author: joesomebody

comments.content:
You can try **[NHL Edge Edmonton](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725063257/http:/www.whatfontis.com/NHL-Edge-Edmonton.font?text=18%2025%2047%20TANGUAY%20SHELLEY%20GIGUERE)** by Eriq Jaffe [Free for personal use]  
(probably a bit emboldened)
You are right. Thank you very much!
